frontMatter.title: Perimeter of rectangle
frontMatter.description: Write a programme to find perimeter of rectangle

contentHtml:
Write a programme to find perimeter of rectangle

Perimeter of rectangle = 2 * ( length + breadth )

length  : 12
breadth : 2

perimeter : 28
markdown:
## Write a programme to find perimeter of rectangle

Perimeter of rectangle = 2 \* ( length + breadth )

```txt
length  : 12
breadth : 2

perimeter : 28
```

---
